mapper.update: UPDATE enterprise e1 JOIN (SELECT e2.eid, e2.address FROM enterprise e2 WHERE e2.eid BETWEEN 52 AND 76 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) AS random_address ON e1.eid >= #{eid} SET e1.address = random_address.address;

SELECT eid, name, legal_person, tel, social_code, address, zip_code, del FROM enterprise
eid != 1
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.name},'%')
AND legal_person LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.legalPerson},'%')
AND tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.tel},'%')
AND social_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.socialCode},'%')
AND address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.address},'%')
AND zip_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.zipCode},'%')
